title: Basic Needs and Wants

vocab.definition: Something you must have to live and be healthy
Something you would like to have but don't need
A place to live that keeps you safe and warm
A drink people need to live and stay healthy
Parts of your body that help you move and get strong
What people eat to get energy and stay healthy
A family place to live; similar to shelter
Clothes we wear to keep us warm and safe
Rest time when our bodies recover and grow
An object children use to play for fun
What people use to pay for things they buy

teachingNotes: Use pictures and sorting activities. Discuss family decisions about spending money. Connect to students' experiences.
